title: Eigen version has two overload for __hadd with CUDA >= 9.0 and CUDA_ARCH >= 6.0
body_html:
When build on Windows with CUDA 9.2 and a cuda arch > 6.0. The current submodule version has a bug with __hadd having two potential overloads as stated here: http://eigen.tuxfamily.org/bz/show_bug.cgi?id=1526

Commit eigenteam/eigen-git-mirror@f59336c fixes this.
body_text:
When build on Windows with CUDA 9.2 and a cuda arch > 6.0. The current submodule version has a bug with __hadd having two potential overloads as stated here: http://eigen.tuxfamily.org/bz/show_bug.cgi?id=1526
Commit eigenteam/eigen-git-mirror@f59336c fixes this.
body:
When build on Windows with CUDA 9.2 and a cuda arch > 6.0. The current submodule version has a bug with ``__hadd`` having two potential overloads as stated here: http://eigen.tuxfamily.org/bz/show_bug.cgi?id=1526

Commit eigenteam/eigen-git-mirror@f59336cee358f92b959de6a0daf07c4ab2318022 fixes this.
